use.flag: Budget Fair Queueing Budget I/O Scheduler.

CJK support for tty framebuffer vt.
Enable Con Kolivas' high performance patchset.
Remove binary blobs from kernel sources to provide libre license compliance.
Use hardened-patchset which includes a grsecurity patches.
Kernel patch enables gcc optimizations for additional CPUs.
Use Ingo Molnar's realtime preempt patches.
